Detailed Description

template<class ObjectType, class EvaluatorType>
struct stDFTree< ObjectType, EvaluatorType >::tDFHeader

This structure defines the DFTree header structure. This type was left public to allow the creation of debug tools.

template<class ObjectType, class EvaluatorType>
char stDFTree< ObjectType, EvaluatorType >::tDFHeader::Magic[4]
 

Magic number. This is a short string that must contains the magic string "DF-3". It may be used to validate the file (this feature is not implemented yet).
